column4: i installed ubuntu jaunty on a acer aspire one netbook and it doesn't reconize the ethernet only the wifi can anyone help me solve this?
does it appear if you do « ifconfig » do you see a eth0 ?
well i did what you said and it says above "description:Ethernet interface" network DISABLED
please paste the ifconfig output on a pastebin
can yu paste the output of "lspci" ?
so is this Ethernet controller: Attansic Technology Corp. Device 1062 (rev c0)
that should use the atl1e module
i dont understand
sudo modprobe atl1e
tell me if a eth0 appears in ifconfig now
FATAL: Moudule alt1e not found.
atle1
i have it here...
which kernel version do you have ?
how to check?
uname -r
do « find /lib/modules/ -name '*atl*'  »
what "trying to partition with gparted" exactly means ?
i tried to make another partition and nothing happend for 2 hours so i canceled it
:| i would boot into a livecd and check if the parition table and paritions are ok
